pages.text: This chapter focuses on just about any sort of device you could imagine using for creating new tools and blocks. For recipes for the key ingredients to a Crafting Mat/Table, see the next chapter.

pages.title: Crafting Mat
pages.text: Crafting Mats allow you to use a 3x3 grid for crafting- they also break instantly, perfect for on the go!

pages.title: Crafting Table
pages.text: A stationary crafting location. These are lot better for your back than crafting on the ground too.

pages.title: Crafting Mat from Table
pages.text: You can always strip the mat from the table if you're going back out to explore.

pages.title: Furnace
pages.text: A basic furnace for cooking or smelting.

pages.title: Brick Stove
pages.text: The perfect place to cook.

pages.title: Blast Furnace
pages.text: An efficient furnace for smelting.

pages.title: Smoker
pages.text: A device for smoking foods.

pages.title: Smithing Table
pages.text: Used to enhance and upgrade tools, also used by some to set gemstones and trinkets on necklaces.

pages.title: Grindstone
pages.text: For repairing and unenchanting tools.

pages.title: Cartography Table
pages.text: For copying, preservering, and expanding maps.

pages.title: Fletching Table
pages.text: Good for fixing up arrows. At least according to the local villagers. Not sure how to use it.

pages.title: Loom
pages.text: Used to design Banners.

pages.title: Composter
pages.text: Turn that old plant waste into something more useful!

pages.title: Stonecutter
pages.text: A spinning blade used for shaping and carving stones, bricks, and guidestones.

pages.title: Cauldron
pages.text: Good for anything from washing clothes to gathering rain water.

pages.title: Brewing Stand
pages.text: An extremely complex device, but great for making potions.

pages.title: Ornate Obsidian Table
pages.text: A sturdy desk, usually used by Scholars and Alchemists.

pages.title: Tablecloth
pages.text: A nice way to pretty up these rather barren desks.

pages.title: Enchanting Table
pages.text: Used by some Scholars along with Souls and Lapis Lazuli to enchant other items with eldritch Runes.
